name: Luma
body:
Hi! I'm Rolly, a web developer based in <del>New Zealand</del> Australia. I work for a company called [Tokbox](https://www.tokbox.com). You can view my [LinkedIn Profile](http://www.linkedin.com/in/rollyfordham). If you'd like to [Get in Touch](mailto:info@luma.co.nz), you can do that too.

I also occasionally mutter about things on [Twitter](http://twitter.com/rollyfordham), and you can find bits of code I've written on [Github](http://github.com/luma/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
